abstract: The Potash Corporation of Saskatchewan confirmed on Wednesday that it has approached the government of Israel about increasing its stake in Israel Chemicals, another fertilizer maker.
snippet: The Potash Corporation of Saskatchewan confirmed on Wednesday that it has approached the government of Israel about increasing its stake in Israel Chemicals, another fertilizer maker.
lead_paragraph: OTTAWA –The Potash Corporation of Saskatchewan confirmed on Wednesday that it has approached the government of Israel about increasing its stake in Israel Chemicals, another fertilizer maker.

headline.main: Potash Confirms Deal Talks with Israel Chemicals
